ideal_referral: I’m looking to connect with: Interior designers & architects – for collaboration and sourcing Homeowners moving into new flats or villas Hospitals , Co-Working Spaces BNI members in interior, furniture, electrical, or automation trades for cross-referrals How You Can Help Introduce me to your clients or contacts planning a new home or renovation Recommend me as the go-to expert for Korean blinds & curtains Some of my catalogs that you can share them - https://heyzine.com/flip-book/928bedad47.html https://heyzine.com/flip-book/9b7a6f22d6.html https://heyzine.com/flip-book/fbefb260d3.html Someone who values aesthetic design, premium quality, and long-lasting performance — not just the cheapest option.
top_problem_solved: Completed 300+ residential and commercial projects across India Partnered with leading interior designers and architects Known for on-time delivery and high customer satisfaction Growing referral network through BNI and design collaborations
my_favourite_bni_story: A month after joining BNI, I received a referral from a fellow member — an interior designer who was working on a luxury apartment project. When I met the client, they told me they had already met two other vendors. But here’s the magic — they said, “You’re from BNI, right? We’ve heard great things about how BNI members work.” That one line built instant trust. Within 15 minutes, I wasn’t just selling blinds — I was designing a complete Korean blinds and curtain solution for their living and bedroom spaces. Not only did the project go smoothly, but the client was so impressed with our professionalism that they referred us to two more projects — both through BNI connections. That one BNI referral turned into three projects, and more importantly — it turned into a long-term friendship with that interior designer. This story reminds me why I love BNI — “It’s not just networking, it’s trust-working.” And that trust helps small businesses like mine — The Eco Studio — grow with quality, credibility, and confidence.

top_problem_solved: We solve the problem of businesses struggling with low-quality printing, missed deadlines, and inconsistent branding. We ensure that every print job — whether it’s school books, pharma materials, real estate brochures, or restaurant menus — is delivered on time, with perfect quality and consistent branding, so our clients can focus on growing their business without worrying about printing issues.
my_favourite_bni_story: One of my favourite BNI experiences started with a freelancer client who referred me to another printer working extensively with hospitals. I reached out, introduced our offset printing services, but didn’t get a response after a few follow-ups. Later, during a training session, I noticed the same person was a BNI member in another chapter. I introduced myself again as a fellow BNI member, and from that day onwards, we have been doing business together for 3 years. He now gives me around ₹70–80k of business every month. This experience taught me that persistence, relationship-building, and leveraging BNI connections truly pay off.

I ensured that all scrum meetings were conducted effectively and that work delivery was met on time. As a result of realization, I terminated the resource from the project and appointed a new one to take over. This action enhanced the credibility and trust with my client, and the project experienced significant progress and achieved milestones as outlined in the roadmap. We have successfully completed the banking project.
